ygData.subject: Re: under water casting
ygData.msgSnippet: If that is the case, and someone is standing on your gate destination, its too bad they don t have a message that your gate is blocked rather than collapses..
ygData.messageBody:
If that is the case, and someone is standing on your gate destination, its
too bad they don't have a message that your gate is blocked rather than
collapses.. I like the collapse thing...its a nice addition (imaginitive
wise.. but not when I want to get the hey out fast and lose my last bit of
mana trying to gate and failing), but I would also like the reason to be
stated if someone is blocking where you will gate to...on that note though,
I do remember ending up right on top of people when I gated/ended up at my
home point so I don't know if that holds true or not in this game. It did
in UO but I don't think EQ runs the gating the same way. I haven't tried
to gate in water yet, have had no cause to at this time.


At 03:51 PM 6/4/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: yur@...
>
>
>
>I have zoned from Qeynos South to Erud's Crossing by swimming. you can zone
>while swimming. i swam all the way from Qeynos to Erud's isle. and i
>teleported
>many times underwater without problem. i think the gate collapse only happens
>when someone is STANDING on your gate position. because the gate collapse
>happen to me only 4 times and those 4 times happen ALL together within a
>period
>of 1 min. where all my gate just either fail or collapse. but after i waited
>awhile, it worked fine.
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------

>http://www.onelist.com
>ONElist has nearly 160,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
